Trial_Design.evidence: using a matched-pair controlled study design

Participants.evidence: all patients were offered anterior or posterior approaches regardless of BMI and anatomy

Intervention.evidence: compared THA with a robotic-assisted posterior approach with manual alignment techniques

Objective.evidence: We therefore sought to compare THA with a robotic-assisted posterior approach with manual alignment techniques

Method_Outcome.evidence: The radiographic cup positioning of the robotic-assisted THAs was compared with a matched-pair control group

Number_Randomised.evidence: a total of 50 THAs were included in each group

Number_Analysed.evidence: a total of 50 THAs were included in each group

Result_Outcome.evidence: The odds ratios for an implanted cup out of the safe zones of Lewinnek et al. and Callanan et al. were zero and 0.142, respectively (95% CI, 0.044, 0.457)
